dtliExcerpt: The revival of Suzan-Lori Parks' Pulitzer Prize-winning play is a tour de force for stars Corey Hawkins and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, who bring fresh energy and depth to this searing family drama.
bwwExcerpt: "Topdog/Underdog" feels oddly out of step with the times.
